import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { createStructuredSelector } from 'reselect' import { auth } from '../../firebase/firebase.utils' import CartIcon from '../cart-icon/cart-icon.component' import CartDropdown from '../cart-dropdown/cart-dropdown.component' // importing SVG import { ReactComponent as Logo } from '../../assets/crown.svg' import './header.styles.scss' const Header = ({ currentUser, hidden }) => (
SHOP CONTACT { currentUser ? (
auth.signOut()}>SIGN OUT
) : ( SIGN IN ) }
{ hidden ? null : }
) const mapStateToProps = ({user: { currentUser }, cart: { hidden }}) => ({ currentUser, hidden }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Header)
